post.author: 고상호
post.content:
As discussed, I have attached the job description for you to pass on to your user group. Please call me if you have any questions.
Our client, based in the Okanagan, is searching for a Web Developer for a 3 month contract with possible extensions. This role is for an immediate start. The Okanagan is a fantastic place in the winter offering great skiing and outdoor activities with all the amenities of Vancouver. West Pacific Consulting will assist qualified candidates with finding furnished accommodation while on contract if needed.
The ideal candidate will be responsible for and should have the following experience: • Developing web pages in JSP (Java Server Pages), using JSTL and Struts/Tiles. • Integrating graphical elements into JSP pages. • Experience with JSP, JSTL and Struts is a must. • Experience with Photoshop / graphics experience is an asset.
Kind regards, Feras Elkhalil Senior Consultant
604.802.3002 mobile 604.294.1213 direct 604.294.1242 fax 1.877.294.1222 toll-free
post.title: WPCG Java opportunity - Vancouver
